article.title: September 2012 Galaxy Update
article.content:
The September 2012 Galaxy Update is now available.

Highlights:

  • 41 new papers
  • 3 new public Galaxy Servers
  • Open Positions at four different institutions

  • Upcoming Events and Deadlines

    • Swiss Galaxy Day
  • New Galaxy-France mailing list
  • Tool Shed Contributions
  • Other News

If you have anything you would like to see in the October Galaxy Update, please let me know.

Dave Clements
